CVE-2002-2443.title: USN-2810-1: Kerberos vulnerabilities
CVE-2002-2443.body: It was discovered that the Kerberos kpasswd service incorrectly handledcertain UDP packets. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue tocause resource consumption, resulting in a denial of service. This issueonly affected Ubuntu 12.04 LTS. (CVE-2002-2443)
